item.title: System Requirements
item.description: Checking the Required Resources GridDB is a scale-out database that – unlike a conventional database – pre-planning of the system design and sizing is not required in order to achieve non-stop operation. However, the following points should be considered as guidelines in the initial system design: Memory usage Number of nodes in a cluster Disk usage The estimation method is explained in sequence below. Functions to increase the capacity by using external storage devices such as SSDs, etc.
